Package fr.applicationcore.network

Class ApplicationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.applicationcore.network.ApplicationClient

  • public abstract class ApplicationClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client to extract data from a JSON file coming from a server running with ApplicationClient module

    This class uses directly HttpRequest class and must be extended to define an application client client since it is an abstract class

    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Zidmann (Emmanuel ZIDEL-CAUFFET)

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      Unique instance of HttpCommunication to send HTTP requests to the server
      private com.google.gson.Gson gson
      Gson instance to convert the server responses from JSON format to object
      private java.lang.String URL
      URL of an application to connect

    • Method Detail

      • requestZero

        protected void requestZero​(HttpMethod method,
                           java.lang.Class<?> apiClass,
                           java.lang.String url,
                           java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters,
                           java.io.File file)
                    throws APIException
        Get nothing from the server JSON response (excepted an error message)
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with the server
        apiClass - The class definition of APIObject that are wanted. It must implements APIObject
        url - The URL address of the server (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        file - The pointer which defines the file to send (used for POSTfile HTTP method)
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from a NodeJS server or from one client function or the system

      • requestOne

        protected APIObject requestOne​(HttpMethod method,
                               java.lang.Class<?> apiClass,
                               java.lang.String url,
                               java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters,
                               java.io.File file)
                        throws APIException
        Get one single element from the server JSON response
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with the server
        apiClass - The class definition of APIObject that are wanted. It must implements APIObject
        url - The URL address of the server (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        file - The pointer which defines the file to send (used for POSTfile HTTP method)
        Returns:
        An APIObject object
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from a NodeJS server or from one client function or the system

      • requestSeveral

        protected java.util.Vector<APIObject> requestSeveral​(HttpMethod method,
                                                     java.lang.Class<?> apiClass,
                                                     java.lang.String url,
                                                     java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters,
                                                     java.io.File file)
                                              throws APIException
        Get several elements from the server JSON response
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with the server
        apiClass - The class definition of APIObject that are wanted. It must implements APIObject
        url - The URL address of the server (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        file - The pointer which defines the file to send (used for POSTfile HTTP method)
        Returns:
        An array of APIObject
        Throws:
        APIException - Exception containing the error message coming from a NodeJS server or from one client function or the system

      • request

        private java.lang.String request​(HttpMethod method,
                                 java.lang.String url,
                                 java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> urlParameters,
                                 java.io.File file)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Auxiliary function to make an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        method - The HTTP method chosen to interact with the server
        url - The URL address of the server (used for all HTTP method)
        urlParameters - The list of parameters to send (used for POST and PUT HTTP methods)
        file - The pointer which defines the file to send (used for POSTfile HTTP method)
        Returns:
        The string returned by the server
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception returned by the system
